title: Business Strategy Practical Competency Enhancement: Geography Education Design Using Flipped Learning Based on Spatial Problem-Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world geographical problems through VR simulations and improve spatial reasoning skills by over 30%
In a flipped classroom environment, learners can apply complex spatial problem-solving strategies at over 80% proficiency through collaborative learning with peers
Learners achieve over 70 points in formative assessments by visualizing and interpreting spatial data using digital tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
